Event.description: Intrigue! Suspense! Excitement! The cast and crew of “Hey Ash, Whatcha Playin’?” will probably not elicit any of these emotions as they answer your questions and talk about what they’ve learned throughout the course of producing the show. Come for the premiere of a new HAWP episode, stay for Papa B’s insight and wisdom.
Event.name: Hey Ash, Whatcha Playin’?: Season Four Fast Four Fourious
